children.value: Welcome! This is a wiki for Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate.
It's a work-in-progress, so some pages don't have content yet, and others may change in time.
If you spot any errors or wish to contribute, please post on
Of course, you're welcome to join just to hang out with other players and romhackers too.
A significant portion of the information found on this site is hand-translated from the
